amendment.description: Amendment sought to modify the Forest Legacy program to allow qualified third party, non-governmental entities to hold the conservation easements financed with Forest Legacy revenue.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 38 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to modify the Forest Legacy program to allow qualified third party, non-governmental entities to hold the conservation easements financed with Forest Legacy revenue.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 219 (Roll no. 270).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 219 (Roll no. 270).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
